name: Statistics and Scientific Inquiry in the Life Sciences
description: Introduction to statistics and its connection to all stages of the scientific inquiry process. Issues around data collection, analysis and interpretation are emphasized to inform study design and critical assessment of published research. Statistical software is used to conduct descriptive and inferential statistics to address basic life sciences research questions.
exclusions: STA220H1, PSY201H1, GGR270H1, ECO220Y1, ECO227Y1, SOC202H1, EEB225H1, HMB325H1, STA248H1, STA261H1, PCL376H1, STA215H5, STA220H5, STAB22H3
